entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Owen Sound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:12 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 6:33 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:33 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning early in the evening. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 6:33 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023
